text:
Release date
July 2024
Question asked
Is the general meeting to be considered as an ‘administrative, management and supervisory
body’? The general meeting is usually a company’s highest decision-making body. However, it
seems that the general meeting is not mentioned once in any of EFRAG’s materials, such as Q&As,
and the focus is on the Board of Directors, its committees and the CEO.
Compilation of Explanations January—November 2024 Page 89 of 278
